comment: The length I was allowed to use for this does not even come close to what I need to describe how awful this professor is and how serious I am about staying away from this course. It seemed like a fun class at first and became the worst class I have ever taken. Calculus was more fun. she grades super strict and the workload is insane. Awful. hate it

Professor Lagrange was very sweet, and she graded pretty leniently. HOWEVER, she assigned more work than any teacher I have ever had in 4 years of college. 3 page response, discussion, and another assignment due every week. Final paper is 5000 words. A partner project that took my friend 25+ hours. Worst work load I have ever had: DONT TAKE HER!!!!
rating_tags: Group projects--Lots of homework--So many papers
